about_the_game:
Deepspace Emporium Demo is the limited version of Deepspace Emporium. Get a glimpse of the core gameplay and a preview of the adventure that awaits in the full game. 

Deepspace Emporium is an immersive shopkeeping simulator set in the gritty, atmospheric depths of a massive space station, where survival and success are anything but guaranteed. You play as a former scavenger who, with a little luck and a sizable loan, has managed to open a shop on the Lower Levels of this colossal outpost. To keep your shop running, you'll need to buy, sell, and barter a wide variety of goods—from counterfeit cigarettes and handmade firearms to life-saving drugs—all while keeping an eye on the ever-increasing rent demanded by your ruthless landlord.

Demo Content:

  • Generalist and Junker starting scenario

  • Game save is not included in the demo

Key Features:

  • Run Your Own Shop: Manage inventory, haggle with customers, and make tough decisions on what to stock. Each sale impacts your reputation and the type of customers you attract.

  • Navigate Gray Morality: Deal with customers from all walks of life, including desperate scavengers, wealthy upper-level clients, and dangerous underworld figures. Not every sale is strictly legal, and not every buyer can be trusted.

  • Face Rising Rent and Expenses: Your relentless landlord demands an ever-increasing rent, pushing you to make more money, even if it means taking riskier deals or questionable jobs.

  • Handle Contraband: Trade in goods of varying legality. Avoid detection by authorities while keeping valuable connections in the black market.

  • Explore Faction Politics: Balance the interests of local factions, corporate overseers, and the law. Each faction can be an ally or a threat, and every choice you make shapes your reputation.

  • Dynamic Economy: Prices fluctuate, demand shifts, and different levels of the station have different needs. Mastering the flow of goods and prices is key to maximizing profits.

  • Survive in a Harsh World: Manage the daily challenges of station life, from resource scarcity to unpredictable dangers, as you struggle to keep your shop open and thrive in the depths of space.

Are you ready to build your empire on the edge of the galaxy, or will you be swallowed up by the relentless grind of Deepspace Emporium?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contain depictions of drug abuse, alcohol abuse and crimes, such as racketeering, bribery and the trade of illegal items.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550/equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050-Ti/equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Deepspace Emporium Demo is a shopkeeping sim set in the depths of a sprawling space station. As a former scavenger turned merchant, you trade in goods of varying legality—all while facing rising rent. Navigate a divided society, balance faction demands, and dodge authorities as you try to survive.
